table_description: Lists directories and files in the given repository's git tree.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the tree.

columns.name: recursive
columns.description: If set to true, return objects or subtrees referenced by the tree. Defaults to false.

columns.name: truncated
columns.description: True if the entires were truncated because the number of items in the tree exceeded Github's maximum limit.

columns.name: mode
columns.description: File mode. Valid values are 100644 (blob file), 100755 (blob executable), 040000 (tree subdirectory), 160000 (commit submodule), 120000 (blob that specifies path of a symlink).

columns.name: path
columns.description: The file referenced in the tree.

columns.name: sha
columns.description: SHA1 checksum ID of the object in the tree.

columns.name: url
columns.description: URL to the file referenced in the tree.
